short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension to help you make sure everybody knows how funny you are.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Spice up your meetings and assert your comedic dominance by installing this extension and having your own personal laugh track available at any moment. Simply click the button and an audience will cheer for you.
